dialogues.text: (furious ) See, that's just like you, Harry. You say things like that, and you make it impossible for me to hate ou == y {almost in tears) And I hate you. I hate you, Harry, I hate you. She starts to cry. Harry puts his arms around her. They kiss. A long kiss. The twinkle ball goes around, twinkling. “They go on kissing. Auld Lang Syne continues in the background.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: My whole life I have never known what this song means.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: I know exactly what you mean.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: I mean, should old acquaintance be forgot. Does that mean we should forget old acquaintances, or does it mean if we do happen to forget them, we should remember them, which is not possible because we forgot them --

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: Maybe you're just supposed to remember you forgot them, or something -- anyway, it's about old friends. They start to kiss again. And as the camera PULLS UP away from them.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: The first time we met we hated each other. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: os 139d 122 SALLY (V.0.) 139d * You didn't hate me, I hated you. (beat) The second time we met he didn't even remember me.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: I did too, I remembered you. (a long beat) The third time we met we became friends.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: We were friends for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: And then we weren't. "SALLY (V-0.). And then we fell in love.

dialogues.speaker: A COUPLE ON A LOVESEAT 140
dialogues.text: Harry and Sally together. Looking AT the CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Two months later we got married.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: It was a beautiful wedding.

dialogues.speaker: EARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah. We had this incredible coconut cake --

dialogues.speaker: . SALLY
dialogues.text: With a very rich chocolate sauce on

dialogues.speaker: HARRY
dialogues.text: Yeah, you know, because everybody doesn't like sauce right on top of their cake -- And as they continue on, we -- FADE OUT.
